title: Pset_DamperTypeSmokeDamper
description:
Smoke damper type attributes.
Pset renamed from Pset_DamperTypeSmoke to Pset_DamperTypeSmokeDamper in IFC2x2 Pset Addendum.

ControlType.title: ControlType
ControlType.description: The type of control used to operate the damper (e.g., Open/Closed Indicator, Resetable Temperature Sensor, Temperature Override, etc.) .
